<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/integrations/oauth/start"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Start OAuth flow for integration

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"provider":"github","redirectUri":"https://app.example.com/integrations","scopes":["repo","gist"]}}},"schema":{"properties":{"provider":{"description":"OAuth provider (github, slack, etc.)","example":"github","type":"string"},"redirectUri":{"description":"Custom redirect URI after OAuth flow","example":"https://app.example.com/integrations","type":"string"},"scopes":{"description":"Additional OAuth scopes to request","items":{"description":"Additional OAuth scopes to request","type":"string"},"type":"array"}},"type":"object","title":"OAuthFlowRequest"}}}}}
>

</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"success":true,"authUrl":"https://github.com/login/oauth/authorize?client_id=...&state=eyJvcmdJRCI6IjAxSE...","state":"eyJvcmdJRCI6IjAxSE..."}}},"schema":{"properties":{"authUrl":{"description":"URL to redirect user to for OAuth authorization","example":"https://github.com/login/oauth/authorize?client_id=...","type":"string"},"error":{"description":"The error message if the request was unsuccessful","type":"string"},"error_code":{"description":"The error code if the request was unsuccessful","type":"string"},"message":{"description":"Optional message (e.g., for authentication required)","example":"Authentication required. Please login first.","type":"string"},"requiresLogin":{"description":"Whether user needs to login before OAuth flow","type":"boolean"},"state":{"description":"OAuth state parameter for security","example":"eyJvcmdJRCI6IjAxSE...","type":"string"},"success":{"description":"Whether or not the request was successful or not","type":"boolean"},"unverified":{"type":"boolean"}},"type":"object","title":"OAuthFlowResponse"}}},"description":"Success"},"400":{"description":"Bad Request"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error"},"default":{"description":""}}}
>

</StatusCodes>
